column4: hello. In Openoffice.org, when I select 100% zoom level in the toolbar, the page displayed is not original size. It is bigger than a paper of that size.
it is
no, it isn't. I can hold a paper a5 on the screen, but the document displayed is not the same size, even though it is also a5!
what kind of screen and resolution you have?
did you solve it?
I have "acer x223w" widescreen monitor 1680x1050 pixel.
no, I didn't
gesss what could be the problem..... you think?
but its a normal 22" wide screen monitor!
maybe I have to find the dpi in the manual and set it somewhere in openoffice?
did you try printing in a A4 paper?
no it's not about printing. The page shows in a wrong size when it is displayed on the screen.
by the way, it is displayed correctly with evince if I "create pdf" in openoffice

menu Format/Page.. then page tab
